Changeset.Change: Pom is changed. More specific: Exclude geotoolkit dependencies. Change range of org.gcube.spatial.data.version to [3.0.0-SNAPSHOT, 3.1.0-SNAPSHOT). Include Geotools repository. Include jvnet dependencies. Exclude geoapi 3.0.0. Include geotools dependencies
Extent logic so as to drop views and materialized views correctly
Rename and refactor Taxonomy to Geocodesystem
Remove MV suffix from Materialized Views
Logic for style management and environment initializer has been added
Merged references of viewbuilders component with geoanalytics component. Removed viewbuilders component
Removed javax.ws.rs.api-2.0.1 to resolve conflict with Jersey Client 1.x.x
Removed config annotations. Now beans are configured from applicationContext
To aid the spark_system.properties loading for spark executions (on geoanalytics)
